## Code and data of a manuscript on inferring phenological drivers from landsat time series

The preprint of the paper is available at: https://eartharxiv.org/sx6w2

Reference: Senf, C., & Krueger, T. (2018). Inferring drivers of changing land surface phenology from Landsat time series. EarthArXiv preprint. DOI: 10.31223/osf.io/sx6w2

All data used for reproducing the figures and results are in the subfolder 'data'. All code is in the 'lib' folder, with the actual model contained in the 'lib/model' folder. The results and figures of the manuscript are in the 'results' and 'figures' folder, respectively.

You need to install the tidyverse and rstan packages in order to run the code. For infos on how to install rstan, please see: https://github.com/stan-dev/rstan/wiki/RStan-Getting-Started
